text: Lucky Jim is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithLucky JimCharles Keil. A Companion to D. W. Griffith and stars Marion Leonard, Mack Sennett, and Herbert Yost. ==Actors== *Marion Leonard - Gertrude *Mack Sennett - Jack *Herbert Yost - Jim, the First Husband *Anita Hendrie - The Mother *David Miles - The Father *Harry Solter - Jim's Friend *Linda Arvidson - Wedding Guest *Billy Bitzer *John R. Cumpson - Wedding Guest *Francis R. Grandon *Grace Henderson *Charles Inslee - Wedding Guest *Arthur V. Johnson - Wedding Guest *Florence Lawrence - Wedding Guest *Owen Moore - Wedding Guest ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Lucky Jim (1909 movie)
